content: I'm planning a trip to the beach soon and I was thinking of booking a ride-sharing service to get there. Do you have any recommendations? By the way, I've had a lot of experience with Uber recently, I took at least 10 Uber rides during my week-long vacation to Hawaii with my family from the 20th to the 27th of April. We flew with American Airlines from our hometown to Honolulu, and then took a connecting flight to Maui.
